text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It's time for the Japan Cup. Everyone has<n>their
attention on Hishi Amazon, and<n>they're looking
forward to her showdown<n>with Narita Brian.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
There's something Hishi Amazon must<n>do. Narita
Brian once told her that<n>there's someone she
wishes to overtake...

text_block_list.name: Monologue
